name: CHANGkaBANG
description:
Chang it up, baby!

"CHANGkaBANG" is a game that is inspired by the likes of Katamari Damacy, Grand Theft Auto, Ratchet and Clank, and Cave Story ( just to name a few). I have started this project in the mid summer of 2019 and looking to continue pursuing its development until I see the crispy end of it. As of now, I have been developing this game full time. Please give the available demo a shot!

The fate of the Changs -

Enter the bustling city of "New Bilsmando", filled with abstract wonders and critters as far as the eye can see. Unfortunately, it's not all wonderful for the "Chang Gang", a compact group of rookie hover-boarding rebels.

One rainy Monday, the city stirred up the hive by demolishing the Chang Gang's faithful hangout spot- no eviction notice. It's up to the hung-over Changs to show the city some real regulations. 

With an inevitable risky deal between the Gang and a mystical but devious Weaponsmith, they will be honing exotic tools of destruction to make it their way-- your way.
